name: Rise and Chime (IN-DEVELOPMENT)
description:
Please give us feedback on our  Feedback Form

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Move
  • SPACE - Jump/Bell Ring
  • E - Interact (Door, Ladder)
  • Q - Bell Drop/Pickup
  • F - Switch Camera
  • J - Restart Level

OVERVIEW/TIPS:

  1. Get to the door with the bell to advance
  2. The leaf rocks cause leaves to fall when the bell rings near them
  3. The bell also RINGS WHEN IT DROPS FROM A HIGH POINT
  4. So it can activate rocks by falling
